00040 require_once('include.php');
00041 
00042 $Submenu= SetSubmenu('groups');
00043 
00044 $Msg= _HELPWINDOW('These settings apply to currently active group only.');
00045 
00046 switch ($Submenu) {
00047     case 'groups':
00048         require_once('conf.groups.php');
00049         exit;
00050     case 'basic':
00051         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('The options on this page determine basic features of the group. Group name shows on the Denied page and logs.')."\n\n".$Msg;
00052         break;
00053     case 'scan':
00054         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Thresholds and settings here are related with the content scanning feature of the web filter.')."\n\n".$Msg;
00055         break;
00056     case 'blanket':
00057         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('Blanket block configuration is used to block all traffic for that rule.')."\n\n".$Msg;
00058         break;
00059     case 'bypass':
00060         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('The options here are for the Denied page which the user receives instead of the page requested.')."\n\n".$Msg;
00061         break;
00062     case 'email':
00063         $View->ConfHelpMsg= _HELPWINDOW('The web filter can report incidents via e-mails. You can setup which incidents to be reported based on violation types and thresholds. Do not forget the single quotes around e-mail addresses and strings.')."\n\n".$Msg;
00064         break;
00065 }
00066 
00067 $ViewConfigName= $Submenu.'Config';
00068 $View->Config= ${$ViewConfigName};
00071 $PRINT_GROUP_FORM= TRUE;
00072 require_once('../lib/conf.php');
00073 ?>
